name: The Crux Nebula Custodian
description:
To win you need to make the most amount of kills between you and your two opponents.

Every kill gives you experience. This experience will be used to upgrade your ship once you die. All ships gain 10 xp per kill, which is enough to grand an upgrade. Every death gives a ship 5xp. Each level grants you a random boost between :

  • Faster fire rate and lower bomb cooldown
  • Increased movement speed
  • Greater health
  • Higher damage dealt

Controls : 

Left click : Shoot blaster

Right click : Launch bomb

A, D : Rotate your ship left and right

W : Thrust your ship in the direction you are facing

*Music, sounds and art assets aren't ours*
